name: SNAKES!! (thaChimp)
description:
UHOH! theres snakes on the loose. Skewer them with your spear to get points but watch out, if you miss you'll run head first into SNAKES!!

Controls:

Q : 1, W : 2, E : 3

ESC to leave the game.

Press f1, f2, and f3 to cycle between the optional palettes!

Game made by Chippy for the Nokia 3310 Jam.

Cool snake on the front and title doot made by LiquidHorse.
